column4: there is no reason to suggest not using XFCE, nothing is worng with XFCE. if your opinion is against it, that's fine, but dont push it on others.
hey, fucktard.  he's using a 500mhz processor.  stfu and read his problem
i used XFCE on a 400mhz processor and it ran fine
yeah, well, i use 333mhz, 256mb ram and xfce doesnt cut it.  i kinda doubt 500mhz is going to be much better with it
